Name: Smoky Whisky Sour
Ingredients: 30 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist and aromatic bitters.
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Garnish with 3 drops of aromatic bitters drawn through foam head.
Review: Islay single malt and maple syrup add a distinctive smoky character to this otherwise classic Scotch Whisky Sour .
History: Created in November 2014 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Smoky Whisky Sour contains 230 calories
